<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Copy Room email to wsd_email field</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if (isCustomerUpgrading()) {
    WSDLogger.info('RoomEmailMigration', 'Started - Migration of wsd_email of Room from email field');
    copyEmailToWsdEmail();
    WSDLogger.info('RoomEmailMigration', 'Completed - Migration of wsd_email of Room from email field');
} else
    WSDLogger.info('RoomEmailMigration', 'Skipping - Migration of wsd_email of Room from email field');

function isCustomerUpgrading() {
    var roomGr = new GlideRecord(sn_wsd_core.WPConstants.TABLES.ROOM);
    return roomGr.isValidField('email');
}

function copyEmailToWsdEmail() {
    var roomGr = new GlideRecord(sn_wsd_core.WPConstants.TABLES.ROOM);
    roomGr.addNotNullQuery('email');
    roomGr.addNullQuery('wsd_email');
    roomGr.query();
    while (roomGr.next()) {
        roomGr.wsd_email = roomGr.email;
        roomGr.update();
    }
}]]></script>
